text: Capuava is a train station on CPTM Line 10-Turquoise, located in the city of Mauá. It was opened in 1920 as a telegraph post and, in 1960, its original building was replaced by the one who is up until today. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 1920 Category:Railway stations opened in 1960
title: Capuava (CPTM)
